para.text: Initial registration fees are as follows:

Registered cemeterian/registered seller who is a sole proprietor of a cemetery or burial goods business — $150 plus $30 per sales contract of $250 or more entered into within the business’ past 2 fiscal years;
Registered cemeterian/registered seller who is not a sole proprietor of a cemetery or burial goods business — $150;
Registered cemeterian who operates a nonprofit cemetery which does not sell burial goods — $50;
Sales counselor — $100.
Registration renewal fees are as follows:

Registered cemeterian/registered seller who is a sole proprietor of a cemetery or burial goods business — $150 plus $30 per sales contract of $250 or more entered into within the business’ past 2 fiscal years;
Registered cemeterian/registered seller who is not a sole proprietor of a cemetery or burial goods business — $150;
Registered cemeterian who operates a nonprofit cemetery which does not sell burial goods — $50;
Sales counselor — $100.
The late renewal fee is $100.
Initial permit fee — $200 plus $30 per sales contract of $250 or more entered into within the business’ past 2 fiscal years;
Permit renewal fee — $200 plus $30 per sales contract of $250 or more entered into within the business’ past 2 fiscal years;
Initial permit fee for a nonprofit cemetery which does not sell sales contracts — $50;
Permit renewal fee for a nonprofit cemetery which does not sell sales contracts — $50;
Late renewal fee — $100.
Replacement of registration — $50;
Replacement of permit — $50;
Returned check fee — $50;
Annual perpetual care trust report fee — $25;
Annual preneed sales trust report fee — $25;

Hearing costs described in Business Regulation Article, §5-312(h), Annotated Code of Maryland, shall be determined to be the cost of a court reporter and the transcripts ordered by the Office or by the Office of the Attorney General for the purpose of presenting a case alleging violation of Business Regulation Article, §5-310, Annotated Code of Maryland, before the Office or the Office of Administrative Hearings;
Additional copy of registration — $50;
Additional copy of permit — $50;
Business name change — $25;
Personal name change — $25; and
Business address change — $25.

annotations.annotation: Business Regulation Article, §§5-204, 5-205, 5-303, 5-307, 5-312, 5-404, 5-605, and 5-710, Annotated Code of Maryland
Chapter revised as an emergency provision effective September 1, 2001 (28:19 Md. R. 1676); emergency status expired March 1, 2002
Chapter revised effective March 18, 2002 (29:5 Md. R. 503)
Chapter revised effective April 10, 2006 (33:7 Md. R. 668)
Regulation .01A, B amended effective April 29, 2013 (40:8 Md. R. 723); April 29, 2024 (51:8 Md. R. 367)
Regulation .02 amended effective April 29, 2024 (51:8 Md. R. 367)
Regulation .02A, B amended effective April 29, 2013 (40:8 Md. R. 723)
Regulation .03D, E amended effective October 22, 2007 (34:21 Md. R. 1914)
Regulation .03I—K amended effective September 26, 2016 (43:19 Md. R. 1072)
